text: @louie_tran @elliejoypanic Coronavirus breeding ground. Why couldn’t the protests wait till at least we had a vaccine for it. I do believe everyone should be treated equal and I don’t get why the colour of someone skin actually matters. It’s just we are in the middle of a deadly pandemic.
